title: 翻转二叉树 (Invert Binary Tree)
content: 思路: // @Title: 翻转二叉树 (Invert Binary Tree) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-09-15 00:22:41 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 40.2 MB // @comment: // @flag: /** * Definition for a binary tree node. * public class TreeNode { * int val; * TreeNode left; * TreeNode right; * TreeNode() {} * TreeNode(int val) { this.val = val; } * TreeNode(int val, TreeNode left, TreeNode right) { * this.val = val; * this.left = left; * this.right = right; * } * } */ class Solution { public TreeNode invertTree(TreeNode root) { if(root==null){ return null; } TreeNode left=root.left; TreeNode right=root.right; root.left=invertTree(right); root.right=invertTree(left); return root; } }
